current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the provisions of title 46, United States Code, related to the Board of Visitors to the
			 United States Merchant Marine Academy, and for other purposes.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: U.S. Merchant Marine Academy Board of Visitors Enhancement Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: U.S. Merchant Marine Academy Board of Visitors Enhancement Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended to read as follows:

header.#text: United States Merchant Marine Academy Board of Visitors

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(referred to in this section as
			 the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Board of Visitors to the United States Merchant Marine Academy

United States Merchant Marine Academy

quote.#tail:
